meanings.definition: A festival or event where films are shown.
meanings.sent1: I love going to filmfests with my friends to watch different movies.
meanings.sent2: Many people travel from far away to attend popular filmfests around the world.
meanings.sent3: At the filmfest, I accidentally sat in the wrong seat and ended up watching a comedy instead of a drama.
meanings.sent4: The filmfest was a colorful bouquet of cinematic experiences, each film a unique petal in the display.
meanings.sent5: The filmfest buzzed with excitement, like a bustling marketplace of stories waiting to be told.

meanings.definition: The act of attending or participating in a film festival.
meanings.sent1: Her filmfests experience began when she volunteered to help organize the event.
meanings.sent2: After months of anticipation, the filmfests finally arrived, and she was thrilled to be a part of it.
meanings.sent3: He took attending filmfests very seriously, even dressing up as his favorite movie character for the occasion.
meanings.sent4: In her mind, filmfests were like a grand adventure, each screening a new chapter in the story of cinema.
meanings.sent5: The filmfests felt like a magical journey through the world of film, with surprises around every corner.
